actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide financial assistance for school construction to local educational agencies educating large numbers of immigrant children.
short_title: Educational Assistance for Immigrant Children Act

summary.text: Educational Assistance for Immigrant Children Act - Directs the Secretary of Commerce to make grants to local educational agencies for the construction of school facilities to assist such agencies in educating immigrant children. Defines immigrant child for purposes of this Act as a child both of whose parents have emigrated from Mexico and are not citizens of the United States and who is provided free public education.

titles.title: Educational Assistance for Immigrant Children Act
A bill to provide financial assistance for school construction to local educational agencies educating large numbers of immigrant children.
